title: Name banned?
body:
So i logged in this morning, to find my alternate account (to make up for this one's perma) name was banned for being inappropriate.

IN WHAT REALM, IS SKYSTORM OFFENSIVE/INAPPROPRIATE, ARE YOU ACTUALLY MENTALLY CHALLENGED?

this is some solid BS, i expect that you read my ticket, and fix whatever fuck up you've done, ASAP

Keeping in mind, that name was fine last night, its only this morning in which it was different.

replies.body: Was the account inactive (hasn't played any games) previously? I know there is a bug at the moment with the message that displays when your name is taken by someone else. Instead of saying what it should (something along the lines of "your name was taken while it was inactive") it's giving the inappropriate name one.

> [{quoted}](name=Seras Dragon,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=xENtEIJ0,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-08-12T03:16:20.209+0000)
>
> Was the account inactive (hasn't played any games) previously? I know there is a bug at the moment with the message that displays when your name is taken by someone else. Instead of saying what it should (something along the lines of "your name was taken while it was inactive") it's giving the inappropriate name one.

No, i literally used it last night, since it's my main until this one gets unbanned (hopefully) i use it at least for 1 game a day
In that case I dunno sorry, you'll have to wait on support.

> [{quoted}](name=Seras Dragon,realm=OCE,application-id=ElA0rvVL,discussion-id=xENtEIJ0,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2018-08-12T05:28:06.353+0000)
>
> In that case I dunno sorry, you'll have to wait on support.

:/

Oh well, its a real shame, a multibillion dollar company, can't even reply to a ticket in under 6 hours.... especially after they point out that you should make contact immediately

{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

I can't say I know *any* company as large as Riot that responds to anything in under 6 hours with any consistency. I think you're underestimating the sheer volume of tickets companies like Riot receive, and if you know any large companies that manage <6 hours then personally I feel that's a kudos to them rather than a criticism of Riot.

LMAO, 'SKYSTORM' contains 'KYS'.

It's an automated ban that should be easily overturned.
